en_text: For 3 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each Skill Boost awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: さあ、お前の罪を数えろ
jp_skill.raw_description: 3ターンの間、チーム内のスキルブーストの覚醒数に応じて 攻撃力が上昇。（スキルブースト＋は2個分で加算）

kr_skill.name: 자아 너의 죄를 세어라
kr_skill.raw_description: 3턴 동안 팀 내의 스킬 부스트의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승 (스킬 부스트+는 2개로 계산)

na_skill.name: Now, count your sins!
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Skill Boost] Awoken Skills in team for 3 turns (Skill Boost+ counts as 2)
